title: Airlines cancel thousands of flights amid winter storm, with Southwest nixing 68%
description: Airlines continue to cancel thousands of flights in what is becoming a Christmas nightmare for so many, as winter storms continue to cause havoc across the U.S.

title: Dolphins QB Tua Tagovailoa in concussion protocol again
description: Tagovailoa met with doctors a day after the Dolphins' 26-20 loss.

title: Jackson, Mississippi, issues boil-water advisory on Christmas Day
description: The City of Jackson, Mississippi --long plagued with water problems-- issued a boil-water advisory on Christmas Day until further notice.

title: China to scrap COVID-19 quarantine for incoming passengers
description: China will drop a COVID-19 quarantine requirement for passengers arriving from abroad starting Jan. 8

title: Broncos fire rookie head coach Hackett after 4-11 start
description: The Denver Broncos have fired coach Nathaniel Hackett after 15 games

title: Deep freeze breaks pipes, creates water crisis across South
description: Days of freezing temperatures in Deep South areas that usually freeze for only hours are threatening dozens of water systems as burst pipes leak millions of gallons of water

title: Sheriff: 6 believed to be dead in Tennessee house fire
description: Authorities believe six people were killed in an early morning house fire in Tennessee

title: WATCH:  Frozen fountain amazes onlookers at New York City park
description: A frozen fountain in New York City amazing onlookers amid record cold.

title: WATCH:  Deadly blizzard brings whiteout conditions to New York state
description: A man in Buffalo, New York, documents his “terrifying" ride home amid whiteout conditions in a deadly blizzard.

title: Holiday sales up 7.6% despite the squeeze of inflation
description: Holiday sales rose as American spending remained resilient during the critical shopping season despite surging prices on everything from food to rent, according to one measure

title: WATCH:  Drone footage shows frozen lighthouse in Saint Joseph, Michigan
description: Stunning drone footage shows a frozen lighthouse from above in Saint Joseph, Michigan.

title: 4 power substations vandalized, over 14K lost power
description: Four power substation facilities were vandalized in Pierce County, Washington, on Christmas morning, knocking out power to more than 14,000 customers.

title: White House condemns 'stunt' of busing migrants in freezing Christmas Eve weather
description: Three buses arrived Saturday outside Vice President Kamala Harris' residence at the Naval Observatory

title: Russia shoots down Ukrainian drone near its Engels airbase
description: The Russian military reported that it shot down a Ukrainian drone.

title: S. Korea fires warning shots after North drones cross border
description: South Korea fired warning shots after North Korean drones violated its airspace.

title: Heavy snow in Japan leaves 17 dead, dozens injured
description: Large swaths of Japan are seeing heavy snow since last week, killing 17 and leaving hundreds of homes without power

title: WATCH:  Giant icicles form at Texas car wash after winter storms
description: A photographer in Texas went "hunting for icicles" over the weekend and said this car wash "had the best ones."

title: Man kills wife, himself at Colorado Jehovah's Witnesses hall
description: Law enforcement officers in suburban Denver say a man killed his wife and then himself at a Jehovah's Witness Kingdom Hall in Thornton
